forum.latestCommentText: im on index and that way be the problem. other people can drop them in.

thread.title: invisible when done object can't be dele

comments.text: can't be deleted. unless you add a visible part and delete by touch the visible part and grip.
ps: it need the whole object to be invisible.
Thanks! This was a security guard behavior to prevent accidental deletions, we'll amend it so that you can still delete while in "see invisible" mode!

thread.latestCommentText: thanks! this was a security guard behavior, we'll amend it so you can still delete while in "see invisible" mode!
